metadata.title: USN-4378-1 -- Flask vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Flask incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4378-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-flask-doc - 0.10.1-2ubuntu0.1 python-flask - 0.10.1-2ubuntu0.1 python3-flask - 0.10.1-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
